newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai PTT picks Canadian firm for pipeline study.
newsitem.headline: Thai PTT picks Canadian firm for pipeline study.

text.p: State-run Petroleum Authority of Thailand has commissioned a unit of IPL Energy Inc. of Canada to do a feasibility study for a crude oil pipeline in southern Thailand, a company official said on Monday.
PTT has signed a memorandum of understanding with IPL International (IPLI) recently and the study is expected to be completed in late August, the official told Reuters.
IPLI also expressed interest in investing in and operating the crude oil pipeline with PTT.
